item.title: Gather
item.description: Tidy Tidy Data is useful Data Tidy Data is: Each variable must have its own column Each observation must have its own row Each value must have its own cell the function gather helps to make data tidy gather() has four main arguments data key & value key is the new name of a variable that will be created from column names value is the name of cell values to gather … which variables to gather can specify individual A,B,C,D or range A:D for columns not used -E, -F

item.title: About
item.description: R-Ladies PDX is part of a worldwide organization to promote gender diversity in the R community. We aspire to encourage and support women in Portland interested in learning or sharing their knowledge of R. For more information, contact us at pdx@rladies.org. R-Ladies PDX seeks to create a space where women are empowered to teach and are comfortable with asking questions. We welcome all those who will help us toward that goal.
